text: This was my second time at this restaurant, and we chose the meat buffet again. I absolutely loved the garlic pork belly‚Äîit was so flavorful! The Thai milk tea was a highlight as well. While the ambience isn't the best, it's still a great spot for a casual dinner. I‚Äôm definitely looking forward to returning!

Very salty soup, tasteless meat, cook so slow for 4 pax per pot. No drink for the buffet, Very expensive drink - mineral water is $2.3, coke -$3.5. Hot room even with two aircon on, Last time eating le

With this price range, I can't ask for more. It seems they‚Äôre using boneless chicken leg meat instead of chicken breast. The bacon and smoked duck are thicker than usual. The polite and friendly young man definitely deserves our support!üëè
Chanced upon this Mookata, it delicious and feeling good to be sitting beside the seaside for a nice sat dinner. Food is fresh especially loved the garlic pork. Will definitely go again

Came here because of good reviews but was super disappointed. Got the buffet option, sides was alright. But the marinated meats were almost inedible, dk suey anot coz weekday then not fresh. Meat were super tough, and marinade flavour cannot taste.
Bangkok street mookata nearby would be a better option for all.
